scripts.sentry: export SENTRY_RELEASE=satlas@$npm_package_version && npx sentry-cli releases new "$SENTRY_RELEASE" && npx sentry-cli releases files "$SENTRY_RELEASE" upload-sourcemaps dist --rewrite --url-prefix '~/assets' && npx sentry-cli releases finalize "$SENTRY_RELEASE" || echo 'Sentry release steps failed, continuing...'
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run sentry
scripts.build:android: npm run gen-assets && npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
scripts.release:android: npm run gen-assets && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cp app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ../build/satlas-android-release.apk && cd ..
scripts.dev:android: NODE_ENV=development npx cap sync android && npx cap run android --live-reload --port=5173
scripts.dev:ios: NODE_ENV=development npx cap sync && npx cap run ios --live-reload --port=5173
scripts.build:ios: npm run gen-assets && npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.nuke:ios: rm -rf ios && npx cap add ios && npm run setup:ios
scripts.release:ios: npm run gen-assets && npx cap sync ios && cd ios/App && agvtool next-version -all && xcodebuild archive -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' && cd ../..
scripts.release:all: npm run release && npm run release:web && npm run release:android && npm run release:ios && git push && git push --tags
